title: U.S. drone strikes in Yemen 2011 to 2019
summary: Overall Number of drone strikes has increased over the Year.
Number of drone strikes is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2015.
The line drastically increased by 3.4 times from Year 2011 to 2012.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Number of drone strikes, of value 37.0 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Number of drone strikes about 11.0 was reached at Year 2011
min_summary: In general Number of drone strikes has rose over the Year.
Number of drone strikes is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2015.
